Title: How to make Cereal
PostBody: Get milk, get a bowl, get a spoon and choose your favorite cereal. Pour the milk into the box, put the bowl on your head and throw the spoon at your little brother while screaming.

Title: Have you guys ever seen Napolean Dynamite?

Title: I have a problem with people who don't use their blinker!!!
PostBody: Who do they think they are?! It's dangerous and dumb and stupid and I hate it when they then act like YOU'RE the one in the wrong and not them. Like WTF is that??? Dont @ me
